name: tioatucsd
description: The Intermission Orchestra at UC San Diego Official Website

scripts.build:css: postcss assets/css/main.css -o dist/css/main.min.css && postcss assets/css/home.css -o dist/css/home.min.css && postcss assets/css/about.css -o dist/css/about.min.css && postcss assets/css/recordings.css -o dist/css/recordings.min.css && postcss assets/css/gallery.css -o dist/css/gallery.min.css && postcss assets/css/join.css -o dist/css/join.min.css
